Ultimate Template for Creators

Welcome to King Code, your digital creative solution. King Code is an online marketing agency in Phuket providing online marketing services to businesses in Thailand, The USA, UK, Laos, South Africa, Zanzibar and all the countries in between. King Code is a team of skilled professionals offering an interconnected set of services to help our clients seize the opportunities of this digital age. We are your full-service digital marketing company specialising in website development, social media marketing, photography and videography.

Creators make
dreams a reality

Reviews

Candy & Jonty took photos of my holiday home in Diani Beach during their stay with us. Working with them was great from start to finish. They offered great advice on best shots for different uses (social media, advertisement, website etc).


★★★★★

Ann Rietjens, owner of Zarafa House, Kenya

It was honestly a great experience hosting you and your partner at Tembo House Hotel. Top professionals, very friendly and open to idea's, charmed us all the very first moment you entered. We have worked with many social media bloggers, by far you and your partner were the top we have come across, a true pleasure to work with. Thank you once again for giving us the opportunity to work with you, and providing us with great content, from shots to videography to promote our hotel.
★★★★★

- Rahim Amigo ,Managing Director of Tembo House, Zanzibar

Candy, and Loris did an amazing job on our NamKhan Project & Ecolodge property. For 2 weeks they were very professional, adapting to our booking schedule, weather conditions and staff presence. I would highly recommend the Candy and the King team as they were incredible, their work resulted in additional bookings, increased social media exposure and social media skills.
★★★★★

- Saita Kiatikhema, General Manager of Namkhan Eco Lodge, Laos
